about_the_game:
Marwan's Haunting takes you on a chilling journey through the once vibrant halls of Shoreside College, now reduced to eerie ruins. As a former student, you awaken in a state of disorientation, surrounded by the remains of your once-thriving educational institution. What caused this devastation?

Uncover the dark secrets that lie within the decaying campus as you embark on a quest for answers. Investigate and discover a series of unsettling events. Explore the building, searching for clues and unraveling the mystery behind the destruction of the campus.

Marwan's Haunting offers a captivating blend of mystery, horror, and puzzle-solving. Uncover the dark history of Shoreside College and confront the malevolent forces that haunt its halls. Will you survive the nightmare and discover the truth, or will you become another victim of the Shoreside mascot's wrath?

Embark on this unforgettable journey and prepare yourself for a haunting experience like no other. The past is calling, and it demands an answer. Can you survive the horrors that await you in Marwan's Haunting?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 570 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
